pitch: Fullstack web developper, I am currently working for the french start-up United Motion Ideas, as a design and development engineer. I graduated from Grenoble Institute of Technology with a Master's degree in Computer Science, and also took courses from the Master's degree in Innovation and Research in Informatics at UPC BarcelonaTech as part of a one-year exchange programme.
looking: I am open to new professional opportunities, especially in NGOs or companies that have a positive impact on society: social tech, green tech,...
